generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Drop Item For Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to move toward a target, and drop an item near the target. This goal requires a "minecraft:navigation" to execute.

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: Total time that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

fields.title: Drop Item Chance
fields.description: The percent chance the entity will drop an item when using this goal.

fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to drop an item for.

fields.title: Check If Outnumbered
fields.description: If true, the mob will check if its outnumbered

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again
Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Operator
fields.description: The comparison to apply with 'value'.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Max Flee
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be from the target to stop fleeing

fields.title: Max Height
fields.description: Maximum height this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See
fields.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See Forget Duration
fields.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Priority for this mob type

fields.title: Reevaluate Description
fields.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the sprinting speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Goal Radius
fields.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.

fields.title: Loot Table
fields.description: The loot table that contains the possible loot the entity can drop with this goal.

fields.title: Max Head Look At Height
fields.description: The maximum height the entities head will look at when dropping the item. The entity will always be looking at its target.

fields.title: Minimum Teleport Distance
fields.description: If the target position is farther away than this distance on any tick, the entity will teleport to the target position.

fields.title: Offering Distance
fields.description: The preferred distance the entity tries to be from the target it is dropping an item for.

fields.title: Drop Attempt
fields.description: The event to trigger when the entity attempts to drop an item.

fields.title: Search Count
fields.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: The height in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: The distance in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

fields.title: Seconds Before Pickup
fields.description: The numbers of seconds that will pass before the dropped entity can be picked up from the ground.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this goal.

fields.title: Target Range
fields.description: The range in blocks within which the entity searches to find a target to drop an item for.

fields.title: Teleport Offset
fields.description: When the entity teleports, offset the teleport position by this many blocks in the X, Y, and Z coordinate.

fields.title: Time Of Day Range
fields.description: The valid times of day that this goal can be used. For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.
